document_data.name: Molnir
document_data.mainbody: '''Molnir the Mighty''' was a [[dwarf]] and part of a valiant group who defended [[Dead Dwarf Bridge]] against forces from [[Narfell]] who hoped to invade [[Almorel]].
document_data.History: Molnir fell to his death from the bridge into the [[Clearflow River]] far below, but not before killing many enemies.
document_data.Activities: Though rarely seen, Molnir haunted Dead Dwarf Bridge as a [[specter]], appearing only at night as a drowned dwarf. He attacked any spellcaster attempting to cross the bridge, but left others alone.
